summary: Frontend testing of OMEGA Dashboard - Ally Communications Hub UI enhancements (GPS Status Bar, GPS Guide tab, Help pattern). All 20 tests passed with MOCKED data.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED by design for offline-first behavior - this is intentional per requirements
GPS Status Bar shows Fix/No Fix indicator with timestamp, accuracy (±4.2m), satellites (9 sats), altitude (52m)
GPS Guide has 5 accordion sections with educational content and Quick Reference card
Help modal properly shows current tab info, status legend, and all tabs list
Tab descriptions with status legend update correctly when switching tabs
Map controls (All Nodes, My Location) are functional - My Location is placeholder for now as noted
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by allyApi.js service and getMockGpsStatus() function
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 UI enhancement features for Ally Communications Hub tested and working. Key test IDs: tab-chat, tab-map, tab-guide, help-btn, ally-help-modal, tab-description, gps-status-bar, gps-fix-indicator, center-all-btn, center-me-btn, gps-guide, accordion-how-gps-works, accordion-what-is-fix, accordion-failure-reasons, accordion-troubleshooting, accordion-best-practices

three_tabs_visible.details: All three tabs visible: Global Chat (tab-chat), Map (tab-map), GPS Guide (tab-guide)

help_button_in_header.details: Help button (?) visible in header with data-testid='help-btn'

help_modal_opens.details: Help modal opens when clicking help button, shows ally-help-modal

help_modal_content.details: Help modal shows: Current Tab info, Status Legend (GOOD/OKAY/NEED HELP/OFFLINE), All Tabs list

tab_description_visible.details: Tab description with legend visible below tabs, updates when switching tabs

gps_status_bar_on_map.details: GPS Status Bar visible on Map tab with data-testid='gps-status-bar'

gps_fix_indicator.details: GPS Fix indicator shows 'GPS Fix' with checkmark (mocked as hasFix=true)

gps_status_metrics.details: GPS Status Bar shows: Updated timestamp, ±4.2m accuracy, 9 sats, 52m altitude

map_controls_visible.details: Map controls visible: 'All Nodes' button (center-all-btn), 'My Location' button (center-me-btn)

all_nodes_button_clickable.details: All Nodes button is clickable and functional

my_location_button_clickable.details: My Location button is clickable (placeholder - centers on default location)

gps_guide_tab_content.details: GPS Guide tab shows educational content with data-testid='gps-guide'

gps_guide_accordion_sections.details: All 5 accordion sections present: How GPS Works, What GPS Fix Means, Why GPS Fails, Troubleshooting Steps, Best Practices

accordion_expandable.details: Accordion sections are clickable and expand to show content

quick_reference_card.details: Quick Reference card at bottom shows: 4 satellites minimum, cold start 5-15 min, hot start <30 sec, 3-15m accuracy

tab_switching_works.details: Tab switching works correctly between Chat, Map, and GPS Guide tabs

tab_description_updates.details: Tab description updates when switching tabs to show relevant info for each tab

previous_features_work.details: Previous features still work: Chat input, send button, messages display, node list

screenshots_taken: 01_initial_load.jpeg - Initial page load with Ally Hub
02_tabs_and_description.jpeg - Three tabs and tab description visible
03_help_modal.jpeg - Help modal with current tab info, status legend, all tabs
04_map_tab_gps_status.jpeg - Map tab with GPS Status Bar and controls
05_gps_guide_tab.jpeg - GPS Guide tab with accordion sections
06_gps_guide_expanded.jpeg - GPS Guide with Troubleshooting accordion expanded
07_final_state.jpeg - Final state back on Chat tab

mocked_apis_list: getMockGpsStatus() - returns GPS status with hasFix=true, accuracy=4.2m, satellites=9, altitude=52m
getNodes() - returns 4 mock nodes (3 with GPS, 1 without)
